Police FC vs Rayon Sports

Police FC 0-1 Rayon Sports

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:25

Rayon Sports ifashe umwanya wa mbere

Gutsinda uyu mukino bihesheje Rayon Sports gufata umwanya wa mbere n'amanota 60, irusha inota rimwe APR FC ya kabiri n'amanota 59 mu gihe hasigaye imikino ine gusa ngo shampiyona irangire. Rayon Sports yo izagaruka mu kibuga ku wa Gatandatu w'icyumweru gitaha yakirwa n'Amagaju.

Police FC yo igumye ku mwanya wa kane n'amanota 43.

Mwakoze abo twabanye uyu munsi kuri uyu mukino, tuzasubire ku wa Kane tubagezaho umukino w'umunsi wa 27 wa shampipiyona uzahuza Gicumbi FC na APR FC.

17:21

Umukino urarangiye

Umukino w'umunsi wa 26 wa shampiyona waberaga kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera urangiye Police FC itsinzwe na Rayon Sports igitego 1-0 kibonetse mu minota ya nyuma y'umukino.

17:21

90+3' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Mugisha Gilbert abonye uburyo bwiza imbere y'izamu ateye umupira ushyirwa muri koruneri na Mitima Isaac.

17:20

90+1' Gusatira kwa Police FC

Ku buryo bwari bubonywe na Peter Otema, Manzi Thierry ashyize umupira muri koruneri itewe na Muvandimwe Jean Marie Vianney umupira ujya hanze.

17:17

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane yerekanye iminota ine y'inyongera

17:15

88' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Michael Sarpong wa Rayon Sports ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo kubuza abakinnyi ba Police FC gutera umupira

17:13

86' Igitego cya Rayon Sports

Nyuma yo gusatira bikomeye, Rayon Sports itsinze igitego cya Jules Ulimwengu ku mupira wari uvuye ku ruhande rw'ibumoso urenguwe na Irambona Eric

17:10

83' Gusimbuza kwa Police FC

Uwimbabazi Jean Paul watsinze igitego cyatandukanyije amakipe yombi mu mukino ubanza asimbuye Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique

17:09

81' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Michael Sarpong yari akinannye neza na Iradukunda Eric uteye mu izamu umupira ufata inshundura ntoya ariko umusifuzi wo ku ruhande avuga ko hari habayeho kurarira.

17:05

78' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Manishimwe Djabel asimbuwe n'umunya-Brazil Raphael Da Silva

17:04

77' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Umunyezamu wa Police FC, Bwanakweli Emmanuel ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gutinda gutera umupira.

17:03

75' ikarita y'umuhondo

Nsabimana Aimable atinze guhana ikosa, ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo n'umusifuzi Ruzindana Nsoro

17:02

74' Gusimbuza kwa Police FC

Hakizimana Kevin asimbuwe na Peter Otema wakiniye Rayon Sports akayivamo mu 2015 ajya muri Police FC mbere yo kwerekeza muri Musanze FC.

16:59

71' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Mutsinzi Ange ateye ishoti rikomeye rigarurwa n'urukuta.

16:58

71' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Mushimiyimana Mohamed wa Police FC ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo akiniye nabi Michael Sarpong.

16:56

67' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Habimana Hussein asimbuwe na Mugisha Gilbert

16:52

63' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Iradukunda Eric ateye umupira wa Rayon Sports ahagana muri koruneri ya Police FC, inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina, ukurwaho na Nsabimana Aimable. Umukino uhagaze gato havurwa myugariro wa Police FC ugize ikibazo.

16:50

62' Umukino wasubiye hasi

Muri iki gice cya kabiri amakipe yombi ari gukina umukino mubi cyane

16:43

55' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Rutanga Eric utishimiye kuva mu kibuga, asimbuwe na Irambona Eric

16:42

54' Gusatirana ku mpande zombi

Police FC iteye umupira w'umuterekano na Muvandimwe Jean Marie Vianney ushyizweho umutwe na Songa ujya hanze, Rayon na yo ibonye uburyo bwa Sarpong umupira ufatwa na Bwanakweli.

16:40

53' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Mugheni Fabrice akiniye nabi Iyabivuze Osee ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo mu rubuga rwa Rayon Sports.

16:38

51' Gusatira kwa Police FC

Manzi Thierry akiniye nabi Songa Isaie, Police ibona umupira w'umuterekano utewe na Mpozembizi Mohamed, Sarpong ashyira umupira muri koruneri n'umutwe mbere y'uko na Mutsinzi Ange arenza umupira na none.

16:34

47' Police FC itangiye isatira

Iyabivuze Osee na Songa Isaie bakojeje igitutu Rayon Sports, umupira urenzwa na Mutsinzi Ange.

16:33

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Twongeye kubaha ikaze. Songa Isaie na Hakizimana Kevin batangije igice cya kabiri cy'umukino.

16:17

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

16:16

45' Umunota w'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane w'umukino yerekanye umunota umwe w'inyongera.

16:16

43' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Rutanga Eric ahinduye umupira mu izamu ushyirwa muri koruneri na Mpozembizi. Uyu myugariro wa Rayon Sports arayiteye umupira ushyizweho umutwe na Manzi Thierry ujya hanze.

16:10

39' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Iradukunda Eric Radu ahinduye umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, ukorwaho gato na Bwanakweli Emmanuel, Ulimwengu Jules na Rutanga Eric bashaka kuwutsinda babisikana na wo. Uyu myugariro wa Rayon Sports ahise ababara, ajya kuvurirwa hanze.

16:07

36' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Rutanga Eric wa Rayon Sports ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukinira nabi umukinnyi wa Police FC, Nsabimana Aimable usohotse acumbagira.

16:06

35' Rutanga ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Manishimwe Djabel ahaye umupira Michael Sarpong na we awucomekera Rutanga Eric uteye umupira mu izamu uramutenguha uca ku ruhande.

16:04

34' Umukino wagabanyije umuvuduko

Amakipe yombi ntabwo akiri gusatirana cyane, ahubwo ari gucungana muri iyi minota.

15:58

27' Police FC ihushije igitego

Ku mupira wari uvuye kuri Songa Isaie, kapiteni wa Police FC, Ngendahimana Eric ateye ishoti rikomeye umupira uca ku ruhande rw'izamu rya Mazimpaka Andre.

15:56

25' ikarita y'umuhondo

Mutsinzi Ange wa Rayon Sports ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukinira nabi Hakizimana Kevin wa Police FC mu kibuga hagati

15:51

20' Ulimwengu na we ahushije igitego

Rayon Sports yongeye gufata umupira uvuye kuri Kakule Mugheni Fabrice awutanga kuri Jules Ulimwengu usize abakinnyi ba Police FC, awushota umunyezamu Bwanakweli wari wasohotse mbere yo gukurwaho na myugariro wa Police FC.

15:49

18' Sarpong ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Manishimwe Djabel afashe umupira wari umaze gutakazwa na Mpozembizi Mohamed, awusubiza Rutanga uwuhinduye mu izamu, Sarpong ateye mu izamu ukurwaho na Bwanakweli Emmanuel.

15:44

13' Gusatira kwa Police FC

Songa Isaie na Hakizimana Kevin bashyize igitutu kuri Mutsinzi Ange na Manzi Thierry babatwara umupira ku bw'amahirwe Habimana Hussein akiza izamu. Police FC iri gusatira muri iyi minota.

15:41

9' Mitima atabaye ikipe ye

Police FC ibonye umupira w'umuterekano, abakinnyi bayo bawutera nabi barawutakaza, Manishimwe Djabel awucomekeye Uliwmengu Jules, Mitima Isaac arahagoboka ashyira umupira hanze.

15:39

7' Rayon Sports yihariye umupira

Muri iyi minota ya mbere Rayon Sports iri guhanahana neza ariko ba myugariro ba Police FC na bo bahagaze neza

15:35

3' Songa Isaie akoze ikosa

Habimana Hussein atakaje umupira ufashwe na rutahizamu wa Police FC, songa Isaie, agerageje kwinjira mu rubuga rw'amahina, asatirwa na Manzi Thierry umusifuzi avuga ko uyu rutahizamu wa Police FC yakoze ikosa. Manzi yavurwaga n'abaganga ariko arahagurutse.

15:32

1' Rayon Sports itangiye isatira

Rutanga Eric yari ateye umupira imbere ashaka Michael Sarpong, ukurwaho na Mitima Isaac ujya hanze.

15:30

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi wo hagati, Ruzindana Nsoro atangije umukino. Umupira wa mbere utewe na Michael Sarpong atanga umupira kuri Manishimwe Djabel akinana na Radu uhaye Sefu.

15:27

Amakipe yombi yishyushya

15:15

Abatemerewe kugaragara mu kibuga ku munsi wa 26 wa shampiyona

1. Ahoyikuye Jean Paul (SC Kiyovu)
2. Ntijyinama Patrick (Bugesera FC)
3. Nzigamasabo Steve (Bugesera FC)
4. Usengimana Pierre (Amagaju FC)
5. Ndikumana Tresor (Amagaju FC)
6. Biraboneye Aphrodice (Amagaju FC)
7. Nzabanita David (Police FC)
8. Rucogoza Aimable (Etincelles FC)
9. Renzaho Hussein (Espoir FC)
10. Ssemazzi John (Espoir FC)
11. Said Abedi Makasi (Umutoza wa Espoir )

15:12

Indi mikino iteganyijwe kuri iki Cyumweru

Uretse uyu mukino wa Police FC na Rayon Sports, hari indi mikino igiye gukinwa ku bindi bibuga:

Espoir FC vs Bugesera FC (Stade Rusizi)
Mukura VS vs Musanze FC (Stade Huye)
Etincelles FC vs Kirehe FC (Stade Umuganda)
Sunrise FC vs Amagaju FC (Nyagatare)

15:05

Amakipe yombi ari kwishyushya

Mu gihe umukino w'uyu munsi wahawe Ruzindana Nsoro, abakinnyi ku mpande zombi bakomeje kwishyushya.

14:54

Imvura yatumye abafana batazira igihe

Imvura nyinshi yaguye mu bice by'Umujyi wa Kigali mbere y'umukino yatumye abafana bamwe batinda kugera ku kibuga.

14:54

Abakinnyi babanjemo ku mpande zombi

Police FC: Bwanakweli Emmanuel, Nsabimana Aimable, Mitima Isaac, Mpozembizi Mohamed, Muvandimwe Jean Marie Vianney, Ngendahimana Eric (c), Mushimiyimana Mohamed, Hakizimana Kevin, Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique, Iyabivuze Osee na Songa Isaie.

Umutoza: Nshimiyimana Maurice 'Maso'.

Rayon Sports: Mazimpaka Andre, Habimana Hussein, Manzi Thierry (c), Mutsinzi Ange, Rutanga Eric, Iradukunda Eric, Niyonzima Olivier, Mugheni Fabrice, Djabel Manishimwe, Ulimwengu Jules, Michael Sarpong.

Umutoza: Robertinho

14:45

Amakipe yombi amaze iminsi yitwara neza

14:44

Police FC irongera guhagarika Rayon Sports?

Mu mikino ibiri iheruka guhuza amakipe yombi, Police FC yanganyije na Rayon Sports, itsinda undi mukino wahuje amakipe yombi mu mikino ibanza ku gitego 1-0. Kuva icyo gihe, Rayon Sports imaze imikino 14 idatsindwa muri shampiyona.

14:41

Umukino uvuze byinshi


Mu gihe Police FC ya kane muri shampiyona ishaka uburyo yafata Mukura Victory Sports, Rayon Sports irashaka umwanya wa mbere kuko ubu irushwa amanota abiri na APR FC yanganyije na AS Kigali ibitego 2-2 ku wa Gatanu.

14:41

Ikaze kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera

Tubahaye ikaze kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera hagiye kubera umukino wâ€™umunsi wa 26 wa shampiyona ugiye guhuza Police FC na Rayon Sports.

Uyu mukino wari kubera kuri Stade ya Kigali, ikipe yâ€™abashinzwe umutekano wâ€™igihugu isaba ko wimurirwa kuri Stade Amahoro.
